title: Curly font with Slab
content:
Hi typophile, attached is an example of a font i've been looking around. Does anyone know what font is that. I've been looking around and found a font that is similar called Zag but this most likely to be better. Anyone have any suggestion or alternative for this kind of font that has yin / yang element?

Thank you!
